mapper.sql:
from stock a left join product b on a.product_prdtSeq = b.prdtSeq
where 1=1
AND b.prdtName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.stckQty > 0 AND a.stckModDate BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND 0 > a.stckQty AND a.stckModDate BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}
mapper.select:
select a.stckSeq ,a.stckQty ,a.stckTotalQty ,a.stckModDate ,b.prdtName
order by stckSeq desc limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
select cdgrSeq ,cdgrName from codegroup where 1=1 order by cdgrSeq desc
select codeSeq ,codeName ,codeNameEng ,codeUseNy ,codeDelNy ,codeDesc ,codegroup_cdgrSeq from code where 1=1 and codeSeq = #{codeSeq}
mapper.update: update code set codeDelNy = 1 where codeSeq = #{codeSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT codeSeq , codeName , codegroup_cdgrSeq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND codeDelNy = 0 AND codeUseNy = 1
